item.title: Курорты Хацвали и Тетнульди
item.description: Two Hatsvali and Tetnuldi ski resorts are waiting you. Beginners will enjoy the modern lifts and spacious slopes, while experienced skiers will appreciate the challenging freeride options with a 1000-meter vertical drop. Hatsvali You can see ski slopes from you hotel window. It takes 10 minutes to get to cable car. Close to Mestia Forest skiing & freeride … Tetnuldi It takes 40 minutes to get to Tetnuldi ski resort. The bus will wait you till all day in the parking.
